VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Sharpshooting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in accuracy when firing both high-tech and low-tech ranged weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Aiming
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in aiming when firing both high-tech and low-tech ranged weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Reloading
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in reloading both high-tech and low-tech ranged weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Piercing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in armor piercing when using sharp melee weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Dueling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in the fast-paced armed melee combat.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Taming
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in taming wild animals.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Ranching
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in ranching and animal produce gathering.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Hunting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in the art of hunting.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Handling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in handling and training colony animals.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Art Quality
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating works of art with increased quality.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Art Quantity
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating works of art quickly and efficiently.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Flooring
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in constructing floors.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Repairing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in repairing broken down and damaged structures.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Architecture
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating complex and beautiful buildings.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Building
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in constructing massive amounts of buildings quickly and efficiently.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Butchering
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in butchering dead animals.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Drug Cooking
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating drugs.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Food Hygiene
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating safe to consume meals in any environment.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Feeding
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating large amounts of meals to feed many people quickly.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Disassembler
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in all things mechanoids, including shredding and disassembling them.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Tailoring
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in tailoring excellent clothes.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Weaponsmithing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating excellent weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Fabricating
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in crafting components efficiently.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Surgery
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in performing safe and effective surgeries.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: First Aid
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise at rapid treatment and medical tend speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Nursing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in caring for ill patients, suffering from various diseases.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Drilling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in using a deep drill to mine resources more efficiently.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Prospecting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in digging up ore and finding more of it.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Tunnelling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in digging massive tunnels and caverns.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Geology
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in rocks and obtaining more stone chunks when digging.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Synthesizing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in creating complex drugs efficiently.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Hacking
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in hacking terminals and ancient systems.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Researching
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in researching new technologies.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Foraging
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in living off the land and foraging the fruits of the forest.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Pruning
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in communicating psychically and pruning the Gauranlen trees.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Harvesting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in ensuring no parts of the plant are wasted on harvesting.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Sowing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in quickly sowing and harvesting large amounts of plants.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Wardening
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in handling prisoners and slaves, recruiting them and arresting them if needed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Negotiating
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in handling negotiations and trading.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Proselytizing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in converting others to their own ways of thinking.
